about_the_game:
In support of Project Gutenberg, a volunteer effort to digitize, archive, and distribute works of literature



  • Decode a selection of excerpts from literary classics both well-known and obscure
  • Get a taste of 7 beloved genres, from nostalgic children's stories to bone-chilling horror
  • Like what you decoded? Every book is free to read and download online--and only one click away!
  • Share the joy of reading--a portion of every sale goes to Project Gutenberg, an online library of over 60,000 free ebooks

"In the case of good books, the point is not to see how many of them you can get through, but rather how many can get through to you." - Mortimer Adler




If you try the demo, let us know what you think! We welcome all feedback and feature requests over on the discussion forum.
detailed_description:
In support of Project Gutenberg, a volunteer effort to digitize, archive, and distribute works of literature



  • Decode a selection of excerpts from literary classics both well-known and obscure
  • Get a taste of 7 beloved genres, from nostalgic children's stories to bone-chilling horror
  • Like what you decoded? Every book is free to read and download online--and only one click away!
  • Share the joy of reading--a portion of every sale goes to Project Gutenberg, an online library of over 60,000 free ebooks

"In the case of good books, the point is not to see how many of them you can get through, but rather how many can get through to you." - Mortimer Adler




If you try the demo, let us know what you think! We welcome all feedback and feature requests over on the discussion forum.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.7+
  • Processor: i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12+
  • Processor: i5 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Prose & Codes Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Celeron
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Explore the wonderful world of books through deceptively simple ciphers. Every purchase benefits Project Gutenberg, an online library of over 60,000 free ebooks.
